puzzles.name: Cracking the Code
puzzles.description: An ancient shrine preserves a lost technology. Interpret clues to find the hidden code.
puzzles.tip: This famous code is visible on the game cartridge.
puzzles.hint: Up up down down left right left right B A start.
puzzles.location: The hub where the node-masters gather

puzzles.name: Just My Type
puzzles.description: A children's game contains a subtle secret. The strongest type leads the way.
puzzles.tip: Use the chart to sort the cards based on type interactions.
puzzles.hint: It's not water, or normal, or even electric.
puzzles.location: The hub for those who govern with glee

puzzles.name: The Tower of Battle
puzzles.description: Prove yourself by building a tower to the sky. Through victory alone shall you pass.
puzzles.tip: The puzzle is temporarily unavailable. Ask for the codeword on Telegram.
puzzles.hint: This can happen to societies, as well as to buildings.
puzzles.location: The lounge in the district of play
